Mabel Ballin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mabel_Ballin 0 Mabel Ballin (January 1, 1887 – July 24, 1958) was an American motion-picture actress of the silent film era. Mabel_Ballin ( January_1_,_1887 – July_24_,_1958 ) was an_American_motion-picture_actress of the_silent_film_era .
